title: Public transport for Coldplay Music of the Spheres World Tour: Wednesday 30 and Thursday 31 October 2024
articleContent:
Heading to Coldplay? With extra services to get you there and back, public transport is the way to go. Take advantage of the city’s Free Tram Zone which extends from Queen Victoria Market to Docklands, Spring Street,

Flinders Street Station and Federation Square to get to Coldplay’s record-breaking Music of The Spheres World Tour at Marvel Stadium 30 and 31 October.

Gates open at 5.00pm.

  • Wednesday 30 October
  • Thursday 31 October

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner. Check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

Wednesday 30 October

 Metropolitan train

Trains depart Southern Cross after the concert ends, as follows:

  • Mernda departing at 11:14pm, 11:24pm and 11:45pm, Platform 9
  • Greensborough at 11.10pm, 11.31pm and 11.39pm, Platform 9
  • Glen Waverley departing at 11:12pm, 11:22pm and 11:47pm, Platform 10
  • Camberwell departing at 11:00pm, 11:17pm and 11:28pm, Platform 10
  • Werribee departing at 11:04pm and 11:23pm, Platform 14
  • Sunbury departing at 11:16pm, Platform 14
  • Watergardens departing at 11:28pm, Platform 14
  • Craigieburn departing at 11:09pm and 11:45pm, Platform 14
  • Upfield departing at 11:00pm, Platform 14
  • Dandenong departing at 11.13pm and 11.33pm, Platform 12
  • Frankston departing at 11:16pm and 11:42pm, Platform 13
  • Sandringham departing at 11:03pm and 11:21pm, Platform 13

Belgrave and Lilydale lines: Buses will replace trains between Camberwell and Ringwood from 8:40pm until last service on Wednesday 30 October, due to maintenance works.

Plan your journey using Journey Planner.

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from Marvel Stadium

Extra trams will operate as Route 30a & 86a between East Melbourne and Stop D1 Etihad Stadium via La Trobe Street.

Take advantage of the city’s Free Tram Zone which extends from Queen Victoria Market to Docklands, Spring Street, Flinders Street Station and Federation Square.

Plan your journey using Journey Planner.

 Regional train

Normal train timetables will operate.

To Southern Cross Station

Additional services

  • Melton (Ballarat) to Southern Cross leaving at 5:44pm
  • Wyndham Vale (Geelong) to Southern Cross leaving at 5:19pm
  • Wyndham Vale (Geelong) to Southern Cross leaving at 5:46pm

Additional capacity

  • Wendouree (Ballarat) to Southern Cross leaving at 2.38pm
  • South Geelong (Geelong) to Southern Cross leaving at 2.50pm
  • South Geelong (Geelong) to Southern Cross leaving at 2.05pm

From Southern Cross Station

Additional services

  • Southern Cross to Bacchus Marsh (Ballarat) leaving at 11:45pm
  • Southern Cross to Ballarat (Ballarat) leaving at 11:35pm
  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) leaving at 11:41pm
  • Additional Coach: Southern Cross to Seymour leaving at 11.30pm

Additional capacity

  • Southern Cross to Wendouree (Ballarat) leaving 11.52pm
  • Southern Cross to Bendigo (Bendigo) leaving 11.57pm
  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) leaving 11.30pm
  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) leaving 12.15am

 Metropolitan bus

The following bus routes will run close to Marvel Stadium:

  • Route 232 - Altona North to City
  • Route 235 -  Fishermans Bend to City
  • Route 302 -  Box Hill to City
  • Route 304 -  Doncaster SC to City
  • Route 905 -  The Pines SC to City
  • Route 906 - Warrandyte to City
  • Route 907 - Mitcham to City

Back to top

Thursday 31 October

Trains depart Southern Cross after the concert, as follows:

  • Mernda departing at 11:14pm, 11:24pm and 11:45pm, Platform 9
  • Greensborough at 11.10pm, 11.31pm and  11.39pm, Platform 9
  • Glen Waverley departing at 11:12pm, 11:22pm and 11:47pm, Platform 10
  • Ringwood departing at 11:00pm, 11:17pm and 11:28pm, Platform 10
  • Werribee departing at 11:04pm and 11:23pm, Platform 14

Take advantage of the city’s Free Tram Zone which extends from Queen Victoria Market to Docklands, Spring Street, Flinders Street Station and Federation Square.

Normal train timetables will operate.

To Southern Cross Station

  • Wyndham Vale (Geelong) to Southern Cross leaving at 5:19pm

  • Bacchus Marsh (Ballarat) to Southern Cross leaving at 5:44pm

Additional capacity

  • Wendouree (Ballarat) to Southern Cross leaving at 2.38pm

  • Route 905 -  The Pines SC to City
  • Route 906 - Warrandyte to City
